When he bought the house, Gigi convinced him to register it in her name, threatening to break up if Kai put it in his name because it would mean he doubted her loyalty.

Kai eventually registered everything in her name, only for her to break up a few months later. Now she‚Äôs allegedly living in the house with her new boyfriend.
